nodes.text: The clone impound vessel, also known as the tow truck, was a type of starship utilized by the clone troopers of the newly-formed Galactic Empire. The vessel featured two frontward-facing arms that could be used to seize starships. The clone impound vessel was utilized on the planet Saleucami, where starships—including civilian vessels—were seized and taken to an impound lot at the spaceport.
